Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Addendum \Ad*den"dum\, n.; pl. {Addenda}. [L., fr. addere to add.] A thing to be added; an appendix or addition. [1913 Webster]
{Addendum circle} (Mech.), the circle which may be described around a circular spur wheel or gear wheel, touching the crests or tips of the teeth. --Rankine. [1913 Webster]
addendum n : textual matter that is added onto a publication; usually at the end [syn: {supplement}, {postscript}] [also: {addenda} (pl)]
